title: Fake League Website and Gifting Event
body:
So um before clicking a link your friends give you like **[removed - wuks]** so on it's fake also the league website they redirect you to is also fake nothing harmful as I've clicked it but yeah just don't. Unless you wanna mess with friends.

_<links removed, Mindstar>_

Other than that they seem so legit. Would Riot mind dealing with this?

replies.body:
Thanks for reporting this.  I've removed the actual links just in case anyone clicks them.

Cheers
Mindstar
